about_the_game:
Synthetic Lover - 18+ Adult Only Patch contains explicit uncensored sex scenes (gay), and it also adds nudity and sexual themed dialogue to several scenes.

Full frontal nudity (genitals are shown, uncensored)

Gay sex acts, including:

1. Groping
2. Handjob
3. Oral sex
4. Masturbation
5. Fingering
6. Anal Sex

Some kinks are part of the content including teasing, spanking, and male domination.

This DLC is only for those who are of legal age and wish to see such content. By downloading this DLC you are confirming you are 18 years of age or older (or your regional equivalent) and agree to see undressing, nudity and sexual interactions.

Installation instructions



1. Click on Download.
2. Wait till DLC finishes downloading.
3. If the game auto launches - CLOSE IT.
4. Start Synthetic Lover from your Library.

content_descriptors.notes: This content is for adults only. You must be of legal age in your country of residence to view this content. This DLC contains explicit uncensored sex scenes (gay).
